text: , son of Tsunehiro, was a kugyō or Japanese court noble of the Edo period (1603–1868). He did not hold regent positions kampaku and sessho. His consort was a daughter of Tokugawa Munechika, ninth head of Owari Domain; with her he had a son Konoe Tadahiro and a daughter who later became a consort of Tokugawa Nariharu, eleventh head of Owari Domain. ==References== * Category:1783 births Category:1820 deaths Category:Fujiwara clan Category:Konoe family
title: Konoe Motosaki
